abilities.name: Pilfer and Plunder
abilities.text: Whenever an opponent pays items as part of an ability or cost of a card, you may put up to one of those items into your cache; if the item is [Weap] or [Lux], +1i

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.text: [O]=> Choose a tile at exactly {3}. When a player has a character on that tile, they may pay [Goods][O]. If they do, they draft, then +[2]
